page.title: 08The Village Green
page.content: The{green}is in the centre of the village. It has always been part of the village,but used to be bigger than it is now.The{roads}around the green would have been dirt tracks, and much smaller than they are now.There would have been far fewer{houses}round the green.There is a{pump}on the green. This would have been used by the people of the village as a main source of water.People would have{grazed sheep and cattle on the green.As well as helping local farmers,this would keep the grass short,as there were no lawn mowers .Now the green is used for cricket,football and rounders matches. Children play on the swings and slides.People walk their dogs there.It is still the centre of the village, although the pump is no longer used.
